apis.name: OpenWeatherMap
apis.description: The OpenWeatherMap API provides weather data for any location, including current weather, forecasts, and historical data.
apis.free_tier: 60 calls/minute, 1,000,000 calls/month

apis.name: NASA
apis.description: The NASA API provides access to a wealth of NASA data, including the Astronomy Picture of the Day, Mars Rover photos, and more.
apis.free_tier: 1,000 requests per hour

apis.name: Unsplash
apis.description: The Unsplash API provides access to a vast library of high-quality, royalty-free images.
apis.free_tier: 50 requests per hour for demo purposes, 5000 requests per hour with a free production key
features: Like photos and add to collections

apis.name: GitHub
apis.description: The GitHub API allows you to interact with GitHub's data, including repositories, users, issues, and more.
apis.free_tier: 60 requests per hour unauthenticated, 5,000 requests per hour authenticated

apis.name: Stripe
apis.description: The Stripe API provides a powerful and flexible platform for developers to integrate payment processing into their applications.
apis.free_tier: Full access to the API in test mode, with no limit on the number of test transactions.
features: Payment processing for credit cards, debit cards, and more

apis.name: Twilio
apis.description: The Twilio API allows developers to programmatically make and receive phone calls, send and receive text messages, and perform other communication functions.
apis.free_tier: Free trial with a small credit to get started.

apis.name: GIPHY
apis.description: The GIPHY API gives you access to the world's largest library of animated GIFs.
apis.free_tier: Generous free tier with a rate limit, GIFs may have a watermark.

apis.name: Spotify
apis.description: The Spotify Web API provides access to Spotify's music catalog and user data.
apis.free_tier: Access to all endpoints, but some require user authorization.
features: Search for tracks, artists, and albums
Access user's saved tracks and playlists
Control playback on a user's Spotify clients
Get audio features for a track

apis.name: Fake Store
apis.description: The Fake Store API provides a set of dummy data for e-commerce or shopping projects.
apis.free_tier: Unlimited

apis.name: REST Countries
apis.description: The REST Countries API provides information about countries via a RESTful API.
apis.free_tier: Open and free to use
features: Search by country name, code, currency, etc.

apis.name: Open Food Facts
apis.description: The Open Food Facts API provides data on food products from around the world.
apis.free_tier: Open and free to use
features: Get product information, including ingredients and nutrition facts
Contribute data by adding new products

apis.name: The Dog API
apis.description: The Dog API provides a collection of dog images.
apis.free_tier: Open and free to use

apis.name: Chuck Norris Jokes
apis.description: The Chuck Norris Jokes API provides a random joke about Chuck Norris.
apis.free_tier: Open and free to use

apis.name: TV Maze
apis.description: The TV Maze API provides information about TV shows, including episode lists, cast, and more.
apis.free_tier: Rate limited to 20 calls every 10 seconds by IP address.

apis.name: CoinGecko
apis.description: The CoinGecko API provides cryptocurrency market data.
apis.free_tier: Generous free tier with a rate limit.
features: No API key required for the free tier

apis.name: JSONPlaceholder
apis.description: JSONPlaceholder is a free online REST API that you can use whenever you need some fake data.
apis.free_tier: Unlimited
features: Dummy data for users, posts, comments, etc.

apis.name: Pexels
apis.description: The Pexels API provides access to a large library of free stock photos and videos.
apis.free_tier: 200 requests per hour, 20,000 requests per month.

apis.name: Mapbox
apis.description: The Mapbox API provides a suite of tools for creating custom maps and location-based experiences.
apis.free_tier: Generous free tier that includes map loads, geocoding requests, and more.

apis.name: WordsAPI
apis.description: The WordsAPI provides a dictionary with definitions, synonyms, antonyms, and more.
apis.free_tier: 2,500 requests per day.

apis.name: OMDb
apis.description: The OMDb API provides access to a large database of movie and TV show information.
apis.free_tier: Free with an API key, with a daily limit on requests.
features: Search for movies and TV shows by title or IMDB ID
Get detailed information, including plot, cast, and ratings
